summary.text: Senior Backend and Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in scalable, microservices-based architectures using Python, Django, FastAPI, and Apache Kafka. Experienced in real-time data processing, optimization, and system integration, with proficiency in GCP, Docker, and Kubernetes for cloud-native solutions.

Proven success in reducing AI resource usage by 40% and creating efficient data pipelines. Background includes impactful roles at Oanda and Femto FP&A, with strong skills in SQL/NoSQL, API development, and system integration.

educations.notes: Courses: Data Structures, Algorithms, Operating Systems

notes.text: Technologies & Tools: Git/GitHub, Linux, Python, Test-Driven Development, SQL,TCP/IP, HTML, CSS, JSON, Unit Testing, SSH, SSL/TLS, HTTP/S, Webpack
Systems & Servers: Networking, Servers, Nginx, Gunicorn, Puppet, Load Balancers
Programming & Frameworks: JavaScript, jQuery, APIs, Flask, ES6, TypeScript, Node.js
Additional Skills: Integration testing, NoSQL, Redis
Core Topics: Internal architecture, operational mechanics of Kafka brokers and consumers
Hands-on Skills: Message serialization, setting up and managing brokers, implementing Kafka in FastAPI and Flask applications
Core Skills: JSX, Components, Props, State, Lifecycle Methods, Event Handling
Conditional Rendering, Lists and Keys, React Router, Hooks, Context API
Additional Skills: CSS in React, Testing with Jest, API Integration

achievements.text: Maintained and optimized legacy code for improved performance.
Migrated and upgraded outdated services to enhance system robustness.
Developed and implemented new backend services.

Enhanced service interactivity and user engagement by introducing caching. This optimization reduced the number of pods at peak usage from 53 to 12, reducing consumption by 77%, efficiently handling hundreds of thousands of requests.
